name: Rebirth arena
description:
AD - move, Space bar - jump, Q - fullscreen mode.

In this game you need to survive on arena with enemies. If you killed enemy : 

2 enemies respawns a little further;

from this enemy can drop out a coin.

You can buy new characters with new abilities and if you dead you will be respawned for next character you have.

If all characters dead - you lost.
